alert.note: Alert for Rockingham; Strafford (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 20 at 10:47PM EST until December 22 at 7:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Vermont...New Hampshire...Maine... Connecticut River Near Dalton affecting Caledonia, Grafton, Essex and Coos Counties. Kennebec River At Skowhegan affecting Kennebec and Somerset Counties. ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in New Hampshire...Maine... Androscoggin River At Gorham affecting Oxford and Coos Counties. Androscoggin River Near Auburn affecting Androscoggin, Cumberland and Sagadahoc Counties. Kennebec River At North Sidney affecting Kennebec County. Kennebec River at Hallowell affecting Kennebec and Sagadahoc Counties. Kennebec River At Augusta affecting Kennebec County. Suncook River At North Chichester affecting Belknap and Merrimack Counties. Lamprey River Near Newmarket affecting Strafford and Rockingham Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL FRIDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Lamprey River near Newmarket. * WHEN...Until Friday morning. * IMPACTS...At 10.0 feet, Bennett Road in Durham starts to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 10:15 PM EST Wednesday the stage was 10.0 feet. - Recent Activity...The maximum river stage in the 24 hours ending at 10:15 PM EST Wednesday was 10.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to fall below flood stage early Friday morning and continue falling to 6.4 feet Saturday morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Motorists should not attempt to drive around barricades or drive cars through flooded areas. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/gray.
